net.realmproject.dcm.features.accessor

Interface DeviceAccessor<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Superinterfaces:
    DeviceEventPublisher, Identity, TargetIdentity
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IDeviceAccessor

    public interface DeviceAccessor<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends Identity, TargetIdentity, DeviceEventPublisher
    DeviceAccessors track the state of a Device and allow indirect interaction with it. This can be used to reduce latency for Device state lookups or for isolating a Device from a high volume of queries. A listener interface provides push notification of updates from the Device.
    Author:
    NAS
